raw_title: JURIANSZ – WINANT (Formerly of BBME and Bank Dhofar, Oman and Mercantile Bank, SL)
raw_body: Son of the late Victor and Nesta, Beloved husband of Eunice, loving father of Karen (USA) and Melanie (People’s Church), brother of late Honorine, loving grandfather of Darryl and Chad, Jason and Kayla and Sean, great-grandfather of Jeremiah, father-in-law of Davis Philip, loving uncle of Rozanne and Johann and Salome and Samuel, brother-in-law of Glenville and the late Yvonne, Patricia and Lloyd. Funeral service will take place at A.F. Raymond’s
